error.signature: Error: Text content does not match server-rendered HTML
error.regex: (Text content does not match|Hydration failed because)

verdict.summary: Server-rendered HTML differs from client-side render, causing a hydration mismatch.

dead_ends.action: Suppressing with suppressHydrationWarning on every element
dead_ends.why_fails: Masks real bugs; mismatches can cause UI inconsistencies

dead_ends.action: Forcing client-side only rendering for the whole page

workarounds.action: Ensure server and client render the same content â€” avoid Date.now(), Math.random() in render
workarounds.how: Move dynamic content to useEffect or use suppressHydrationWarning only on specific elements

workarounds.action: Use dynamic() with { ssr: false } for components that can only render on the client
workarounds.how: import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'; const Comp = dynamic(() => import('./Comp'), { ssr: false })

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Error' indicates a server/client HTML mismatch during hydration, while 'ChunkLoadError' indicates a failed chunk load (stale deployment).
